metadata.title: CVE-2017-8829 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Deserialization vulnerability in lintian through 2.5.50.3 allows attackersto trigger code execution by requesting a review of a source package with acrafted YAML file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8829` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lintian - 2.5.43ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lintian package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.43ubuntu0.1').
